Package Banksystem

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Banksystem.Bank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IATM, ICustomerService, IEBanking, java.rmi.Remote
    public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
implements IATM, IEBanking, ICustomerService

    Bank<\h1> This class is the bank and manages every input from the client and returns all needed values.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
